transcript:
Customer: Waheguru Waheguru Waheguru
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello, Gaurav sir, Sandhya baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART ke office se senior manager.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji madam.
Customer: Haan ji sir, kaise hain aap?
Executive: Badhiya madam.
Executive: Actually aapne fake wrong product enquiry ka aapne ek ticket raise kara hua hai wapas se IndiaMART par.
Customer: Haan, diya hai madam, maine recording bhi bheja hoga, aap recording suno.
Executive: Haan, woh maine recording bhi suna hai sir, aapne Rajat ko share kar Customer ka customer ka na bahut jyada issue aa raha hai, customer bhai ki mere se milna chahta hai, kabhi kuch, kabhi kuch.
Customer: Ab yeh dekhiye maine bheja hai, ab main agar apni leads use kar raha hun.
Customer: Aur samne customer phone uthane ke baad kehta hai ji nahi main to mujhe chahiye hi nahi.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Aap baat samjhe na meri, kyunki meri jo leads mujhe mil rahi hain, maine woh use kari to samne wala customer kya jawab de raha hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To sir yeh aapko saari leads se hi problem aa rahi hai kya abhi?
Customer: Kai kai saari aati hain, woh to maine bheja hua hai jo humare account manager hain, maine unko bheja hua hai. Haan Rajat ko aapne share kari hui hai, Rajat ne mujhe share bhi kara hua tha sir. Haan maine bahut saari bheji hai, kal parso bhi bheji hai, ek ek sir aap iski recording suniye ki customer kya bol raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai, woh main ek baar check karwa leti hun team se na ki yeh problem aa rahi hai. But matlab wahi yeh customer ka customer yeh customer
Customer: Kal jo maine bheji hai, customer kisi aur cheez ka kaam karta hai.
Customer: Woh keh raha hai ji maine kisi aur cheez ki daali hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aapne use suna hai dhyan se?
Executive: Woh maine sun liya sir aapka recording na, unhone aapko yahi cheez bola hua hai, haan ji.
Customer: Haan, ki hum to kisi aur product ki enquiry kar rahe hain, ab woh yeh system pe kaise generate ho gayi yeh yeh nahi samajh aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main backend team ko ek baar share kar deti hun, kahan par matlab yeh problem create ho rahi hai jiski wajah se aapko yeh problem face ho rahi hai, theek hai?
Customer: Aap isko na recording ko dhyan se suniye, customer ko call karni hai to aap call kariye, ki uski enquiry kya hai aur woh lena kya chah raha hai aur lead kiski generate kar rahe ho raha hai. Lead kiski generate ho rahi hai, correct haan ji.
Customer: Main ek baar check karwa leti hun sir yeh cheez ka na kya problem aa rahi hai. Tabhi maine tabhi maine iski recording bheji hai, maine kaha aap check karayenge thoda dhyan se.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Hum ek baar check karwa lete hain, haan ji haan ji, okay. Iske alawa aapka koi aur issue ya concern hai to aap batao sir.
Customer: Wohi thoda bahut to chal hi raha hai, woh to thoda woh to ki customer hai. Woh to thoda bahut to aapko chalega hi services mein na, maine aapko last time bhi bola tha, 100% relevant aapko nahi mil sakta hai. Ab ek do client aapke paas agar aise aa rahe hain to please aap unko thoda sa ignore kariye. Ek do ek ek do nahi aate na madam, agar mere paas week hafte ki 50 aa rahi hai na to usme se paanch hi kaam ho rahi hain, 45 jo hain ya to holding mein chali jaati hain ya khali woh aapne ek aur cheez usme dala hai sir that usme aapse yeh pucha tha ki matlab kuch enquiry drop ho rahi hai previous year se to aapne yes bola hai usme.
Customer: Kis mein?
Executive: Call mein, enquiry drop ho rahe hain aapka kuch? Enquiry to bilkul as it is jaise 400 average aapka chal raha hai to enquiry to aapka 400 average chal hi rahi hai.
Customer: Woh to enquiries to aa hi rahi hain, enquiries to jitni leads hoti hain hum use kar hi lete hain, hum koi chodte hi nahi khali.
Executive: Conversion ratio aapka bhi kaisa hai matlab IndiaMART se, theek chal raha hai ya wahi 10 mein se ek.
Customer: 10 mein se ek.
Customer: Haan. But utna to sir aapka return nikal jata hoga na jitna aap invest karte ho IndiaMART pe usse jyada to return nikalta hi hoga na?
Customer: Nahi nahi humare humne to waise supplier bhi bana rakhe hain na.
Executive: Achha. Humara humare marketing karne wale bhi hain na offline jo marketing kar rahe hain humare product. To unko bhi to jaata hai na, unka bhi beech mein 20% ka commission hota hai woh marketing karte hain product ki.
Executive: Theek hai, aapka jo bhi problem hai main ek baar yahan se aur check karwa leti hun sir ki matlab yeh aapka kaise hum resolve kara sakte hain. Rest jo main aapka catalog dekh rahi hun, catalog wagera to sir aapka proper sahi hai abhi, maintained hai aapka catalog. Recent jo bhi leads wagera aapne abhi consume kari hain to woh aapke liye relevant thi?
Customer: Relevant madam wahi to issue hai na thoda sa ki customer enquiry mein jyada enquiry karta hai ki bhaiya yeh kaise banta hai, main aage dekhna chahta hun, main yeh karta hun, to wahi hai na. Main to customer ko kehta kehta kyunki main customer ko kehta kehta thak gaya hun, bhaiya mere paas time nahi hota. Agar main sabse meeting kyunki aapne kyunki samne wala kehta hai main sample dekhna chahta hun. Agar samne wala sample dekhne ke liye mera time waste karega, apna bhi time waste karega.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Matlab wahi hai na ki kul milake jag marne wale bahut aate hain.
Executive: Samajh gayi, samajh gayi.
Customer: But sir thoda sa to dekhiye aapko beech mein beech mein abhi thoda sa issue yeh bhi aaya hai ki jaise humara product market mein hai, kuch naya product hai. Haan. To agar kisi ko product milta hai na to woh search karta hai, search karte hain humare paas aata hai. To kya bachcha bol raha hai ji, bhaiya main to dekh raha tha. Haan. Uncle main to dekh raha tha.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Kai to ladies ladies bhi hoti hain kai, aisa nahi hai ki khali bachche hi hain, ladies bhi bahut saari aisi hain.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hame to khali sample lena hai, hame apne ghar ke liye try karna hai, yeh karna hai woh karna hai.
Executive: Samajh gayi. Theek hai sir main thoda sa yeh resolve karati hun aapke liye, theek hai?
Executive: Kahan par kya problem hai main backend team ko ek baar share kar deti hun, woh ek baar check karke mujhe bata de kahan par kya problem aa rahi hai.
Customer: Baki jo maine aapko kal bheja hai woh usme jo hai customer woh alag hi demand kar raha hai.
Executive: Haan, woh to maine dekha sir, suna hai woh to maine. Hmm.
Executive: To yeh aapka lead hai kya jo aapka waste hua hai?
Customer: Bahut saari waste hoti hain madam, khali ek thodi na hoti hai, main to main to yeh to Rajat ji mere se jude hain jab se. Haan ji, haan haan haan. To to kam se kam bhi unke paas saikdo screenshot chale gaye honge aaj do mahine mein, saikdo. Woh main samajhti hun haan ji. Kyunki kyunki kyunki main na niche review de deta hun. Customer kehta hai na ki bhaiya main to khali dekh raha tha ya phone hi nahi uthata, main uske review mein star one ki rating deta hun aur niche message bhi dal deta hun pakka bakayda. Jisse ki main uske upar kabhi click karu to mujhe message pada dikh jaye ki fake hai.
Executive: Samajh gayi haan ji.
Customer: Aap dekh sakte ho system pe aapko bhi dikha raha hoga.
Executive: Haan ji woh to dikhta hi hai sir. Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai madam, aap check kara lijiye. Haan ji main ek baar check karwati hun na iska revert aapko karwa deti hun team se kya problem hai, leads mein thoda sa irrelevancy jo aa rahi hai. Theek hai? Aur jo aapne yeh mail kara hai yeh main aapka close karu concern?
Customer: Theek hai madam, aap kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan ji, theek hai aapke paas feedback mail jayega aap usse satisfied agar aap satisfied ho to aap satisfied kar dijiyega. Theek hai madam. And sir please in future agar koi problem aaye to aap please Rajat ko share kar dena main directly aapse baat karke aapka concern resolve kar dungi.
Customer: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Theek hai, haan ji, okay sir, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer reports receiving fake inquiries.

- Customer mentions low conversion rate from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the lead generation issue.

- Executive will share the issue with backend team.

- Executive confirmed catalog is properly maintained.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will revert after checking with team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, irrelevant leads, catalog, resolution
